account.passwordRules: Use 8 or more characters with a number and a lowercase letter. No spaces.

exhibitorLoyalty.programDescription:
Simply enter your valid Magical Movie Rewards number to have your Fandango service fee waived, earn points, and redeem applicable rewards from Marcus Theaters.

Fandango will automatically send your card number along with your order to Marcus Theaters for processing. Marcus Theaters will credit your Magical Movie Rewards account when tickets are retrieved at the theater.

The Magical Movie Rewards program is managed by Marcus Theaters, not Fandango. For questions regarding your account or the program, please contact Marcus Theaters or visit https://marcustheatres.com/movie-rewards

defaultPlan.checkboxLegalText: By checking this box, you agree to the FanClub Program Terms and that we can save and charge your card for future purchases. Once your 7-day trial expires, your FanClub Membership will renew into a paid membership and you will be billed $9.99 per month starting 11/20/2025, plus any applicable taxes until you cancel. Prices subject to change. You can cancel anytime by visiting your account page and selecting “cancel membership” prior to the start of any future billing periods to avoid future charges. The cancellation will be effective at the end of the then-current period (no refunds or credits for partial membership periods unless required by law). Any promotional offers applied as part of this purchase will be delivered to you via email after the end of your 7-day free trial, once your paid membership begins.​
defaultPlan.termsApplyCopy: As part of joining FanClub, we will save and charge your card for future purchases. Once your 7-day trial expires, your FanClub Membership will renew into a paid membership and you will be billed $9.99 per month, plus any applicable taxes until you cancel. Prices subject to change. You can cancel anytime by visiting your account page and selecting “cancel membership” prior to the start of any future billing periods to avoid future charges. The cancellation will be effective at the end of the then-current period (no refunds or credits for partial membership periods unless required by law). Any promotional offers applied as part of this purchase will be delivered to you via email after the end of your 7-day free trial, once your paid membership begins.

alternatePlans.checkboxLegalText: By checking this box, you agree to the FanClub Program Terms and that we can save and charge your card for future purchases. Once you complete this transaction, your FanClub Membership will be valid for one year from the date of purchase and will renew annually. You will be billed $99.00 per year, plus any applicable taxes until you cancel. Prices subject to change. You can cancel anytime by visiting your account page and selecting “cancel membership” prior to the start of any future billing periods to avoid future charges. The cancellation will be effective at the end of the then-current period (no refunds or credits for partial membership periods unless required by law). Certain promotional offers obtained as part of this purchase will be applied to your current order, other promo codes will be made available to you via email or in your account once your paid membership begins.

exhibitorGiftCard.pinInfo: We only accept Marcus gift cards with a PIN on Fandango. If you have a Marcus gift card without a Pin, please visit your local Marcus Theatre box office to redeem your gift card.
exhibitorGiftCard.topMessage: Please enter your gift card number and PIN below.

loyaltyCard.loyaltyProgramDescription:
Simply enter your valid Magical Movie Rewards number to have your Fandango service fee waived, earn points, and redeem applicable rewards from Marcus Theaters.

Fandango will automatically send your card number along with your order to Marcus Theaters for processing. Marcus Theaters will credit your Magical Movie Rewards account when tickets are retrieved at the theater.

The Magical Movie Rewards program is managed by Marcus Theaters, not Fandango. For questions regarding your account or the program, please contact Marcus Theaters or visit https://marcustheatres.com/movie-rewards

tickets.discountedTicketMessage: Valid ID may be required for theater admittance.
tickets.loyaltyTicketMessage: A valid Marcus Rewards Program number is required to purchase these tickets.

ticketQuantityMessage.body: Bags or packages with any dimensions measuring larger than 12” X 12” X 6” will not be permitted into the theatre. This includes but is not limited to purses, backpacks and totes. Exception: Medical equipment bags and diaper bags.

charities.headline: Support Boys and Girls Club
charities.description: It's for the kids. Boys & Girls Club of America offers quality programs designed to empower youth to excel in school and lead healthy, productive lives. Round up to the nearest dollar at checkout today to support their mission and kids across America.
charities.subHeadline: Round up to help provide kids life-enriching programs, including moviegoing adventures
charities.smtpEmailConfirmationTemplate:
Thank you {EMAIL_ADDRESS} for donating {DONATION_AMOUNT} to Boys & Girls Club of America, P.O. Box 117431 Atlanta, GA 30368-7431.

Boys & Girls Club of America is a Section 501 (c) (3) organization with Federal Tax ID of 13-5562976. No goods or services were received in exchange for the contribution amount specified. As such, the contribution is tax deductible to the extent permitted by law.

If you would like Fandango to send your name and email address to the charity or check your donation status, please visit our FAQ at https://support.fandango.com/fandangosupport/s/article/How-can-I-send-my-contact-information-to-the-charity-I-donated-to-at-checkout.

optedOutPaymentErrorConfig.defaultMessage: Donations are not available with the payment option applied.

creditCardBanner.altText: Pay with Mastercard and get 50 bonus VIP+ points.

feesInTicketOverlay.filterList: NY, TN, CA, MD, CO, MN, MA, VA

offers.label: GET A $5 REWARD
offers.title: for every 4 tickets purchased!
offers.description: Earn Fandango FanRewards Points on every movie ticket purchase. Every four tickets earn you a $5 reward to spend on Fandango or Fandango at Home.
offers.terms: Buy movie tickets through your Fandango account on Fandango.com or the Fandango app and receive 125 FanRewards Points for each movie ticket. All or at least some portion of the purchase for each ticket must be paid using a credit or debit card, PayPal, credit in your Fandango account from a prior exchanged purchase or a Fandango gift card (i.e., if you use a promo code then only part of that purchase can be paid for using the promo code) to qualify for FanRewards Points. Movie tickets must be for a movie with a showtime starting before 11:59 p.m. PT on the last day of the promotion period. When you receive 500 FanRewards Points, you will receive a $5.00 Discount Reward which you will need to convert into a Discount Promo Code for use on a qualifying purchase on www.fandango.com or www.fandangoathome.com. Discount Promo Code expires 21 days after the $5.00 Discount Reward is posted to your Fandango account. Discount Promo Code cannot be combined with any other offer, promo code or discount. Discount Promo Codes cannot be used to purchase a gift card. After applying your Discount Promo Code, any unused balance will automatically expire. Void where prohibited. Fandango reserves the right to modify or cancel this offer at any time and without notice. This offer is subject to the FanRewards Program Terms at https://www.fandango.com/fanrewards and Fandango’s Terms and Policies and Privacy Policy at www.fandango.com/Terms-and-Policies. Additional taxes may be owed on a rental or purchase price shown for Fandango at Home.

amenities.name: Reserved seating
amenities.description: This showtime allows you to reserve your seats ahead of time.

theater.agePolicyMarkup: Child Ticket Policy: The Marcus Theatres policy for a Child’s ticket is age 3 to 11. Children under 3 and may not occupy their own reserved seat. Children pricing does not apply for Rated R Films. Generally, it is not appropriate for parents to bring their young children with them to R-rated motion pictures. Children under the age of 6 are not admitted to R-rated movies at any time as these features are intended for mature audiences. For more details please see our Ratings Policies Senior Citizen Ticket Policy: Senior Citizen’s ticket is age 60 and over. We offer a “Young At Heart” Discount ticket on Fridays (offered also on Wednesdays at select locations. Restrictions may apply, see Young At Heart details here. Youth Escourt Policy: For all movies starting after 6PM, guests under 18 years of age must be accompanied by a parent or legal guardian 25 years of age or older at the following locations: BistroPlex Southridge (WI), Gurnee Mills (IL), Hulen (TX), Little Rock (AR), Menomonee Falls (WI), Movie Tavern Brookfield Square (WI), O'Fallon (IL), and Pickerington (OH).
theater.name: Movie Tavern Covington
theater.tqpMessageMarkup:
Bag & Package Policy
Bags or packages with any dimensions measuring larger than 12” X 12” X 6” will not be permitted into the theatre. This includes but is not limited to purses, backpacks and totes. Exception: Medical equipment bags and diaper bags.
